title: THCudaCheck FAIL file=/opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1535491974311/work/aten/src/THC/THCGeneral.cpp line=663 error=11 : invalid argument
body:
when i run python test.py --config configs/edges2shoes_folder.yaml --input inputs/edges2shoes_edge.jpg --output_folder outputs --checkpoint models/edges2shoes.pt --a2b 1
